nodes.bodyText: This is great!  But you'll need to update the test data for this test.  See CONTRIBUTING.md.
The reference docs say you need org_id with when passing team_id.  Please add tests showing this working correctly.

nodes.bodyText: Sorry, just because it is deprecated doesn't mean we can remove the test for it.  We must ensure it continues to work until it is removed.
